meanings.definition: A man who marries and kills one wife after another.
meanings.sent1: The town was scared of the mysterious bluebeard who lived on the hill.
meanings.sent2: In the fairy tale, Bluebeard's wives were never seen again after they entered his castle.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the Halloween costume of a bluebeard with a fake axe.
meanings.sent4: Her ex-boyfriend was like a modern-day bluebeard, leaving a trail of broken hearts behind him.
meanings.sent5: The legend of Bluebeard made the villagers shiver with fear.
